<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BackslashCount = FirstNonBackslash;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FirstNonBackslash == <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-path-cpp-/stringref/#ad0f54a163ac500b144590640c6f1eb6b">StringRef::npos</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Arg&#91;FirstNonBackslash&#93; == </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;\\&quot;&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is an embedded quote.  Escape all preceding backslashes, then</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// add one additional backslash to escape the quote.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#afb795990ffc0cb7321e7d1eacc246324a8eea62084ca7e541d918e823422bd82e">Result</a>.append(BackslashCount &#42; 2 + 1, </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;\\\\&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#afb795990ffc0cb7321e7d1eacc246324a8eea62084ca7e541d918e823422bd82e">Result</a>.push&#95;back(</span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;\\&quot;&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is just a normal character.  Don&#39;t escape any of the preceding</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// backslashes, just append them as they are and then append the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// character.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#afb795990ffc0cb7321e7d1eacc246324a8eea62084ca7e541d918e823422bd82e">Result</a>.append(BackslashCount, </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;\\\\&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#afb795990ffc0cb7321e7d1eacc246324a8eea62084ca7e541d918e823422bd82e">Result</a>.push&#95;back(Arg&#91;FirstNonBackslash&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Drop all the backslashes, plus the following character.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Arg = Arg.drop&#95;front(FirstNonBackslash + 1);</span></CodeLine>
